item.title: Where do you think you are going?
item.description: Once you walk with God, you are part of His great plan. He will lead you wherever He wants you to go. Obey His voice, "that it may be well with you"
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Once you walk with God, you are part of His great plan.
item.itunes:summary: He will lead you wherever He wants you to go. Obey His voice, "that it may be well with you"
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: We live in Noah's world
item.description: The world today is quite the same as in the days of Noah. We must build the arc of our salvation by giving ourselves to Jesus and accepting Him as our Lord and Saviour.
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The world today is quite the same as in the days of Noah.
item.itunes:summary: We must build the arc of our salvation by giving ourselves to Jesus and accepting Him as our Lord and Saviour.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: Separated from the love of God
item.description: The love of God is so big that it cannot be measured. Nothing can separate us from it. No matter what we do or how deep we fall, God still loves us and is ready to forgive.
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The love of God is so big that it cannot be measured.
item.itunes:summary: Nothing can separate us from it. No matter what we do or how deep we fall, God still loves us and is ready to forgive.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: That Still Small Voice
item.description: How do we hear God's voice. We must be prepared to hear it...
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Be prepared to listen to God's voice
item.itunes:summary: How do we hear God's voice. We must be prepared to hear it...
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: Abundant Provision
item.description: God supplies for all our needs. We must trust Him for all our provisions and have faith that we will never lack anything.
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: God's provision never fails
item.itunes:summary: God provides all that we need.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: Mighty Man of Valour!
item.description: Trust in the Lord to use you the way He wants, even though we are weak.
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: We are strong in the Lord
item.itunes:summary: God uses us, and makes us strong to grant us victories.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: Be Made Whole!
item.description: Total healing is there for us.
item.author: info@revivingfire.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Total Healing
item.itunes:summary: God's desire is that we should be complete, that every area of our mind, soul and body should be restored and healed.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, christian, sermon, preaching, service, Lord, God, healing
item.itunes:author: Philip Higham

item.title: The battle is the Lord's
item.description: Only God gives us victory

item.itunes:subtitle: It is always God's victory
item.itunes:summary: By ourselves, we cannot have victory. It is the Lord who fights for us. The battle is His. It will be His victory, that all my know that there is a God in heaven.
